title: Romantic Vanuatu Private Beach Paradise with Guided Village Tour, Daily Breakfast, Return Airport Transfers & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Embrace serenity and set your watch to island time at this secluded oasis - a tranquil resort located right on the postcard-perfect Coral Sea, on Vanuatu's main island of Efate. Settle into the rhythms of a barefoot, island paradise from the moment you arrive at this stunning retreat, where traditionally crafted fares, a pristine white-sand beach, picturesque beachfront dining and an in-house spa await.

Ride the waves at Breakas Beach, renowned as Port Vila's premier surf spot, dive into the sparkling 22-metre oceanfront infinity pool, or revel in panoramic ocean vistas. Savour delectable dishes made from fresh, locally grown organic produce, perfectly crafted to delight your senses at the onsite restaurant, then toast to your tropical escape with a glass of wine as the sun sets at Salt Bar.
offer_address: Pango Road, Efate, Port Villa, Vanuatu
